skill.s1.name: Fearless Rebel
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#fe0037][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fe0037][b]Curse DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies, with a [color=#fe0037][b]20%[/b][/color] base chance to inflicts a stack of [color=#fe0037][b][i]Curse[/i][/b][/color].
skill.s2.name: Ominous Omen
skill.s2.description: Deals [color=#fe0037][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fe0037][b]Curse DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy.
If there is only 1 enemy, gains 2 [color=#ff7744][b][Fury][/b][/color].
skill.s3.name: Doom Pursue
skill.s3.description: Deals [color=#fe0037][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fe0037][b]Curse DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.
Increases [color=#fe0037][b]DMG[/b][/color] Dealt by [color=#fe0037][b]25%[/b][/color] during Extra Turn.
Increases [color=#fe0037][b]DMG[/b][/color] Dealt by [color=#fe0037][b]25%[/b][/color] if the target have any debuffs.
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Deals [color=#fe0037][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fe0037][b]Curse DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies and gains 1 [color=#ff7744][b][Fury][/b][/color].
skill.p1.name: Revenge
skill.p2.name: Devour
skill.p2.description: Increase [color=#fe0037][b]DMG[/b][/color] Dealt by [color=#fe0037][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] during Extra Turn.
awareness.a0.name: Showtime
awareness.a0.description: At the end of Joker's turn, gains 1 stack of [color=#ff7744][b][Fury][/b][/color] for every enemy that's below [color=#fe0037][b]60% HP[/b][/color], up to 5 stacks.

At the end of Joker's turn, if he has 3 or more stacks of [color=#ff7744][b][Fury][/b][/color], and if Joker is not in his own Extra Turn, gains 1 Extra Turn (Joker's buffs/ debuffs will not count down when entering Extra Turn), removes 3 stacks of [color=#ff7744][b][Fury][/b][/color] when own Extra Turn ends.
Each enemy can only give Joker 1 stack of [color=#ff7744][b][Fury][/b][/color].
awareness.a1.name: Flying Cards
awareness.a1.description: Skills deal [color=#fe0037][b]30%[/b][/color] more damage to the main target and [color=#fe0037][b]10%[/b][/color] more damage to non main target.
awareness.a2.name: Deceptive Tricks
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s3][color=#cb212f][b][u][Doom Pursue][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=hl][color=#cb212f][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: Unpredictability
awareness.a3.description: During Extra Turn, decrease SP cost by [color=#fe0037][b]80%[/b][/color].
Increase [color=#fe0037][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#fe0037][b]50%[/b][/color] if Joker's SP is not less than [color=#fe0037][b]60%[/b][/color].
awareness.a4.name: Dream Weaving
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s1][color=#cb212f][b][u][Fearless Rebel][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s2][color=#cb212f][b][u][Ominous Omen][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#fe0037][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Out of Thin Air
awareness.a6.name: Grand Finale
awareness.a6.description: Immediately execute enemy with less than [color=#fe0037][b]25% HP[/b][/color], up to [color=#fe0037][b]250% ATK[/b][/color].
This can only trigger once per enemy.
After using a skill during Extra Turn, deal [color=#fe0037][b]50% ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#fe0037][b]Curse DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.
